content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of:
- Coal mining drill (position y)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position z

### Copper plate mine at position (w)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position w1) and a furnace at position (w2)
- Burner mining drill (position w3) and a furnace at position (w4)
- Burner mining drill (position w5) and a furnace at position (w6)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Verify that the furnace is operational and has items to inspect before checking its inventory.
